metadata.synopsis: The bugbear vendor in Moonrise spends his time throwing an axe at a target. He is quite full of himself and proud of his strength.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_Agoto -166; 22; -166Wait for ADs after he throws his axe

0.speaker: Lann Tarv
0.text: I could hit a pixie from a hundred paces.
0.context: NodeContext: congratulating himself on a well-thrown axe, while practicing

1.speaker: Lann Tarv
1.context: NodeContext: congratulating himself on a well-thrown axe, while practicing

2.speaker: Lann Tarv
2.context: NodeContext: while practicing axe-throwing - annoyed not to be with the bulk of the army

3.speaker: Lann Tarv
3.text: I should be on the frontline, cleaving skulls.
3.context: NodeContext: while practicing axe-throwing - annoyed not to be with the bulk of the army
